TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStyleSheet

summary.span: 定义某个类为支持样式规则的创建而必须实现的方法。

span.span: Defines the methods that a class must implement in order to support the creation of style rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此接口的类可使用它来支持创建样式规则。Classes that implement this interface can use it to support the creation of style rules. 若要自定义创建和注册级联样式表的方式，必须创建一个实现此接口的类。To customize the way cascading style sheets are created and registered, you must create a class that implements this interface. 类实现此接口，供 ASP.NET 通过 属性使用。The class implements this interface for use by ASP.NET through the property. > [!NOTE] > 不支持在异步回发过程中以编程方式添加或修改样式或样式规则。Adding or modifying styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发会更新页面区域，而无需更新整个页面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Microsoft Ajax 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398874(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398874(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的 实现 来演示如何以编程方式创建新样式规则并注册自定义 对象。The following code example uses the implementation of to demonstrate programmatically creating a new style rule and registering the custom object. 在此示例的第一部分，将创建一个自定义 对象， `labelStyle` 然后为当前位置注册 (URL) 。In the first part of the example, a custom object, `labelStyle`, is created and then registered for the current location (URL). 然后， `label1` 标签调用 方法，以便将 `labelStyle` 样式应用于 `label1` 标签。Then the `label1` label calls the method so that the `labelStyle` style is applied to the `label1` label. 该示例的第二部分定义另一个自定义 对象， `bodyStyle` 并设置其属性来创建新的样式规则。The second part of the example defines another custom object, `bodyStyle`,and sets its properties to create a new style rule. > [!NOTE] > 此类主要适用于想要创建自定义实现的开发人员。This class is intended primarily for developers that want to create a custom implementation. 此示例演示 .NET Framework 提供的实现。This example demonstrates the implementation provided by the .NET Framework. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet/CS/istylesheetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet/VB/istylesheetvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面示例中网页的代码隐藏文件。The following is the code-behind file for the Web page in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet/CS/istylesheetcs.aspx.cs#2)]

Public Sub CreateStyleRule (style As Style, urlResolver As IUrlResolutionService, selector As String)
public: void CreateStyleRule(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ style, System::Web::UI::IUrlResolutionService ^ urlResolver, System::String ^ selector);
abstract member CreateStyleRule : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style * System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService * string -> unit

param.name: style
param.span: 要添加到嵌入式样式表中的样式规则。

span.span: The style rule to be added to the embedded style sheet.

param.name: urlResolver
param.span: 一个实现了 的对象，它包含当前位置 (URL) 的上下文信息。

span.span: An -implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).

param.name: selector
param.span: HTML 页中受到样式影响的部分。

span.span: The part of the HTML page affected by the style.

summary.span: 由类实现时，它为指定的文档语言元素类型或选择器创建样式规则。

span.span: When implemented by a class, creates a style rule for the specified document language element type, or selector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为指定的选择器创建样式规则。The method creates a style rule for the specified selector. 可以为同一选择器创建多个样式规则。Multiple style rules can be created for the same selector. 如果 `urlResolver` 设置为 `null` ，则使用当前实例的 URL 。If `urlResolver` is set to `null`, the URL of the current instance is used. > [!NOTE] > 不支持在异步回发过程中以编程方式添加或修改样式或样式规则。Adding or modifying styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发会更新页面区域，而无需更新整个页面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Microsoft Ajax 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398874(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398874(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的 实现 来演示如何定义新的 对象 `bodyStyle` 。The following code example uses the implementation of to demonstrate defining a new object, `bodyStyle`. 然后 `bodyStyle` 通过调用将添加到当前 URL 。Then `bodyStyle` is added to the current URL by calling . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule/CS/istylesheetcreatestylerulecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule/VB/istylesheetcreatestylerulevb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub RegisterStyle (style As Style, urlResolver As IUrlResolutionService)
abstract member RegisterStyle : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style * System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService -> unit

param.name: style
param.span: 要添加到嵌入式样式表中的样式规则。

span.span: The style rule to be added to the embedded style sheet.

param.name: urlResolver
param.span: 一个实现了 的对象，它包含当前位置 (URL) 的上下文信息。

span.span: An -implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).

summary.span: 由类实现时，它将新的样式规则添加至网页的 部分中的嵌入样式表。

span.span: When implemented by a class, adds a new style rule to the embedded style sheet in the section of a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将新样式规则和 属性名称添加到对象的部分内的嵌入样式表中 `` ，并将该规则与自动生成的样式名称关联。This method adds a new style rule and property name to the embedded style sheet within the `` section of a object, and associates the rule with an auto-generated style name. 使用指定的参数呈现对象 `urlResolver` 。The object is rendered using the specified `urlResolver` parameter. 如果 `urlResolver` 设置为 `null` ，则使用当前的 URL 。If `urlResolver` is set to `null`, the URL of the current is used. 如果 已注册对象，则不会多次添加该对象。If a object is already registered, it is not added multiple times. > [!NOTE] > 不支持在异步回发过程中以编程方式添加或修改样式。Adding or modifying styles programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发会更新页面区域，而无需更新整个页面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Microsoft Ajax 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398874(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398874(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的 实现 来演示如何创建自定义 对象， `labelStyle` 然后将其注册到 (URL) 当前位置。The following code example uses the implementation of to demonstrate creating a custom object, `labelStyle`, and then registering it for the current location (URL). 然后， `label1` 标签调用 方法，以便将 `labelStyle` 样式应用于 `label1` 标签。Then the `label1` label calls the method so that the `labelStyle` style is applied to the `label1` label. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle/CS/istylesheetregisterstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle/VB/istylesheetregisterstylevb.aspx#1)]
